Rappi, a YC company held a competition.
My team won, and I began working with the CEO, for 6 months.
After that I went into the Product team.

Association for Computing Machinery Uniandes student chapter.

events.desc:
Kiwi Campus is a logistics company for students.
Took about 25% of the market with no paid marketing.

events.title: Joined ACM Uniandes Student Chapter
events.desc: Association for Computing Machinery is the biggest group about computing.

events.title: Competed in the 'Innovación con TIC' contest

A bianual competition where teams take a semester to design and implement a product

Figured out that Chemical Engineering was not appropriate for me
